item.title: Eastofoz add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description: "The hottest places in hell are reserved for those who, in times of great moral crisis, maintain their neutrality." -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Eastofoz add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Eastofoz add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "Good fiction creates its own reality." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Eastofoz add a quote by Marilyn Manson
item.description: "In the end we're all Springer guests, really, we just haven't been on the show." -- Marilyn Manson

item.title: Eastofoz add a quote by Anna Campbell
Eastofoz add a quote by Sarah MacLean
Eastofoz add a quote by Sarah MacLean
Eastofoz add a quote by Diane Setterfield
item.description: "There is something about words. In expert hands, manipulated deftly, they take you prisoner. Wind themselves around your limbs like spider silk, and when you are so enthralled you cannot move, they pierce your skin, enter your blood, numb your thoughts. Inside you they work their magic." -- Diane Setterfield

item.title: Eastofoz add a quote by Robert Herrick
item.description: "Give me a kiss, and to that kiss a score; then to that twenty, add a hundred more; a thousand to that hundred: so kiss on, to make that thousand up a million. treble that million, and when that is done, let's kiss afresh, as when we first begun!" -- Robert Herrick

item.title: Eastofoz add a quote by Sheryl Sandberg
item.description: "We cannot change what we are not aware of, and once we are aware, we cannot help but change." -- Sheryl Sandberg
